price: As for those who call out to you [O Prophet] from behind the chambers, most of them have no understanding.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلۡحُجُرَٰتِ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
